arts.ttl: West Brom bounce back to beat Oxford
arts.sum: Substitute Aune Heggebo's winner ensured West Brom ended their recent poor run as they came from behind to beat Oxford 2-1 at The Hawthorns.

arts.ttl: West Brom vs Oxford predictions: Throstles could be thwarted
arts.sum: West Brom face Oxford in the Championship on Saturday and Dan Childs expects a positive day for the away side, who can come away with at least a share of the points.
